snippet: Along with the peacekeeper, three others were injured in the western region of Darfur, an area that has been plagued by rebel and tribal fighting.
abstract: Peacekeeper with the joint United Nations-African Union force is killed and three others are injured in Sudan’s western Darfur region when their patrol is ambushed.
lead_paragraph: Along with the peacekeeper, three others were injured in the western region of Darfur, an area that has been plagued by rebel and tribal fighting.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
